strings.ifItWasNotYou: If this wasn't you, please ignore this.

userCreated.name: User creation
userCreated.title: Notice: User created
userCreated.aUserWasCreated: A user was created using code {code}.
userCreated.notificationNotice: Note: Notification messages can be toggled on the admin dashboard.

inviteExpiry.name: Invite expiry
inviteExpiry.title: Notice: Invite expired
inviteExpiry.notificationNotice: Note: Notification messages can be toggled on the admin dashboard.

passwordReset.name: Password reset
passwordReset.title: Password reset requested - Jellyfin
passwordReset.someoneHasRequestedReset: Someone has recently requested a password reset on Jellyfin.
passwordReset.ifItWasYou: If this was you, enter the pin below into the prompt.
passwordReset.ifItWasYouLink: If this was you, click the link below.
passwordReset.codeExpiry: The code will expire on {date}, at {time} UTC, which is in {expiresInMinutes}.

userDisabled.name: User disabled
userDisabled.title: Your account has been disabled - Jellyfin

userEnabled.name: User enabled
userEnabled.title: Your account has been re-enabled - Jellyfin

userExpiryAdjusted.name: Expiry adjusted
userExpiryAdjusted.title: Account expiry adjusted - Jellyfin
userExpiryAdjusted.yourExpiryWasAdjusted: Your account's expiry date has been adjusted.
userExpiryAdjusted.ifPreviouslyDisabled: If your account was previously disabled, it may have been re-enabled.
userExpiryAdjusted.newExpiry: Your account will now expire on {date}.

inviteEmail.name: Invite email
inviteEmail.title: Invite - Jellyfin
inviteEmail.toJoin: To join, follow the below link.
inviteEmail.inviteExpiry: This invite will expire on {date} at {time}, which is in {expiresInMinutes}, so act quick.

welcomeEmail.name: Welcome
welcomeEmail.title: Welcome to Jellyfin
welcomeEmail.youCanLoginWith: You can login with the details below

emailConfirmation.name: Confirmation email
emailConfirmation.title: Confirm your email - Jellyfin
emailConfirmation.clickBelow: Click the link below to confirm your email address and start using Jellyfin.

userExpired.name: User expiry
userExpired.title: Your account has expired - Jellyfin
userExpired.contactTheAdmin: Contact the administrator for more info.

expiryReminder.name: Expiry reminder
expiryReminder.title: Reminder: your account will expire soon - Jellyfin
expiryReminder.yourAccountIsDueToExpire: Your account is due to expire in {expiresIn}, or on {date} at {time}.
